biography: Cliff Eidelman is a composer and conductor who has scored films including Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country, Crazy People, The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants, and Heâ€™s Just Not That Into You. He has conducted his film scores and other original compositions with The Metropolitan Orchestra of London, The Los Angeles Master Chorale, and The Toronto Symphony Orchestra.
name: Cliff Eidelman
